title: N690, N300, N302, N172, N29 For Sale

posts.post_title: N690, N300, N302, N172, N29 For Sale
posts.post_content:
Quite a few vintage cards added for sale or trade, images shown at: [url]www.imageevent.com/brailey[/url] 

100's of other vintage cards also for sale and scans posted. 

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url] 

Here is a sampling of cards I would think of most interest:

1) E95 Mathewson SGC40 $850
2) E95 Plank SGC20 $450
3) T204 Plank SGC20 $1,800
4) T204 Keeler PSA2 $1,000
5) N690 Kalamazoo Bats Townsend SGC10 $600
6) T3 Keeler $400
7) E90-1 Graham SGC30 $600
8) E90-1 Stahl PSA2 $800
9) E90-1 Duffy PSA1 $500
10) E90-1 Chase SGC50 $325
11) N300 Mayo Cut Plug Ganzel SGC20 $225
12) N300 Mayo Cut Plug Ward SGC10 $475
13) N302 Mayo Cut Plug Football Holly SGHC10 $150
14) N302 Mayo Cut Plug Football Beard PSA1 (MC) $200 
15) T206 Mathewson Sovereign 350 SGC60 $2,400
16) T206 Cobb (Bat On) $1,800
17) T206 McCauley (SL) Old Mill SGC50 $225
18) T200 Fatima Boston NL SGC10 $650
19) E145 1915 Cracker Jack Reulbach SGC40 $220
20) Delong Pie Trayner $130
21) T205 Tinker PSA2 $100
22) N284 Buchner Gold Coin SGC60 Gore $225
23) N172 Ward (HOF) SGC10  $325
24) N29 Miller SGC20 $160

Images shown at [url]www.imageevent.com/brailey[/url]
....then select the appropriate album.

Please contact me at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

All reasonable offers considered.

Thanks for looking,
Mike
